t: The Healing Bees of the Amazon Forest
s: April 5, 2021 - Amazonian bees possess innate knowledge of medicinal plants. By collecting resin from different trees and plants, they manufacture one of the first medicinal cocktails produced by animal societies, known as propolis.

t: We need to call on Amazon to help save the bees
s: December 16, 2024 - Once bees are gone, they’re gone for good. You can’t same-day ship a new species. Tell Amazon to stop selling bee-killing pesticides today.
